021/**
022 * ProxyProvider represents a Proxy method instances such as Bungee/Velocity in an implementation.
023 *
024 * @author creatorfromhell
025 * @since 0.1.2.0
026 */
027public interface ProxyProvider {
028
029  /**
030   * Used to register a plugin message channel.
031   *
032   * @param channel The channel to register.
033   */
034  void registerChannel(final String channel);
035
036  /**
037   * Used to send a message through a specific plugin message channel.
038   *
039   * @param channel The channel to send the message through.
040   * @param bytes   The byte data to send.
041   */
042  void send(final String channel, final byte[] bytes);
043}
